channel.title: 317 HaizScape [Job Applications] [Pi]
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=4][COLOR=Black]HaizScape is a newly developed server that is gaining players everyday, yesterday we gained 8 new players so we are now up to 11 players total, there is usually at least 3 players online at the same time (It's only our second day of release). I am looking for a [SIZE=5][COLOR=Blue][U]web developer[/U][/COLOR][/SIZE] for my server, a vBulletin license is required, you will get your own rank, and in time, will start getting paid whenever donations start coming in. Here are some features and the trailer of the server.[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][U][COLOR=Red]Server Features:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=Orange][U]Skills:[/U][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Cyan]Firemaking (perfected clipping) Woodcutting Construction Summoning Dungeoneering Hunter Mining (98%) 100% all the other skills[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange][U]Minigames:[/U][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Cyan]100% Pest Control (NPC's attack void knight) 100% Fight Pits (Working viewing orb) 100% Warriors Guild (Working animated NPC's) 100% Duel Arena 100% Jad Zombies Pyramid Plunger [/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange][U]Special Attacks:[/U][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Cyan]Statius Warhammer Vesta Long Sword Korasi Armadyl Godsword Zamorak Godsword Saradomin Godsword Bandos Godsword Dragon Claws Dragon Bow[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange][U]Cool Features:[/U][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Cyan]Prestige - Get all your combat skills to 99 and prestige and buy stuff in the prestige shop Loyalty - Be active on the forums and in-game and be helpful to get Loyalty Points for the loyalty shop[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange][U]Bosses:[/U][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Cyan]Avatar of Destruction King Black Dragon Dagganoth Kings Chaos Element Everlasting Kalphite Queen Sea Troll Queen[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange][U]Trailer:[/U][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hCQrsLS0ktg[/youtube]
[size=4][u]Application:[/u]
[code]Name: Age: Why you're applying: Why we should hire you: How many years have you been experienced: Do you have a vBulletin License: Some of your work: Extra Information:[/code][/CENTER]
